data.title: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra’s Complete Relationship Timeline
meta_keywords: nick jonas priyanka chopra relationship timeline
data.meta_description: From their humble beginnings as a summer romance of 2018 to their elaborate wedding celebrations, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have become a major celebrity power couple. Here, relive their best moments.
data.text:
From their humble beginnings as a summer 2018 romance to their elaborate wedding celebrations, Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas have become a major celebrity power couple. Here, relive their Met Gala meeting, Chopra's latest emotional birthday montage, and every moment in between. Plus, see the heartfelt messages they penned for the second anniversary of their first date.

2016

It was revealed in a December 2018 Vogue cover story that Jonas made the first move via Twitter DM on September 8, 2016. "I'm hearing from a few mutual friends that we should meet," he wrote to Chopra. She responded, 'My team can read this. Why don't you just text me,' along with her phone number.

The future couple would text for several months, although Chopra admits she had never allowed her relationships to go public before. But when it came to Jonas, she told Vogue she thought, "What is happening? I've not known myself like this." Jonas had been previously linked to Olivia Culpo and Miley Cyrus.

February 2017

In the same Vogue interview, the pair remembers reconnecting at the 2017 Vanity Fair Oscars afterparty. Jonas recalls that when he saw Chopra walk into the room, he put his drink down and got on one knee to say (in front of a crowd), "You're real. Where have you been all my life?'"

May 2017

Months later, Ralph Lauren coincidentally invited both Jonas and Chopra to attend the Met Gala in his designs. A week before the event, Jonas and Chopra grabbed a drink together at the Carlyle Hotel. She also invited Jonas to her apartment for a night that ended not with a kiss, but a platonic back pat. However, Joe Jonas told Vogue that after the Met Gala and its afterparties Chopra "kind of knocked him off his feet. He was just this little puppy dog."

Later that month, Chopra told Andy Cohen on Watch What Happens Live that while she wouldn't rule out a future flirtation with Jonas, the two were just friends.

May 2018

A whole year later, a source told Us Weekly that the pair was dating. "They are dating and it's brand new," the insider said. "It's a good match and they are both interested in each other." This news was solidified over Memorial Day weekend, where the duo saw Beauty and the Beast Live in Concert at the Hollywood Bowl, attended a Dodgers game, and were spotted on a friend’s boat. Another source told People, "They're flirtatious and have been hanging out and text all the time," although their relationship is "very casual." However, fans noted that Chopra and Jonas had been liking each other's Instagram posts for months prior.

June 2018

Jonas commented, "That smile ❤️" on an Instagram of Chopra. "Burgers and Chanel...my favourite combo with my fav girls," she captioned a meal at In-N-Out.

Chopra soon began commenting on Jonas's posts. On a photo of the musician posing with a koala bear at an Australian zoo, she wrote, "Who is cuter?"

Next, the potential couple was spotted at JFK airport for a trip where Chopra reportedly met Jonas's parents in New Jersey. "It's a huge deal that Nick brought Priyanka to his cousin's wedding," a source close to the couple told People. "He's dated a lot over the last couple years but it's never been anything serious, so this is a big step." The source added, "Nick and Priyanka really like each other, and his family enjoyed getting to know her as well. She'll fit right in!"

Weeks after Chopra accompanied Jonas to his cousin’s wedding, the new couple flies to India for a week-long vacation so Jonas can meet Chopra's family. A People source said, "They're very happy. It's getting serious."

During the visit, the couple went IG official. Jonas shared a video of Chopra walking toward him across a balcony with the caption,"Her 😍."

Next, the burgeoning couple goes to Brazil where Jonas performs at the VillaMix festival. "Him 😍," Chopra wrote alongside a clip of him onstage.

July 2018

Around this time the couple was also spotted wearing matching gold bands, although no engagement was announced just yet. They ware reportedly on display for a Citi biking excursion with Joe Jonas and Sophie Turner through NYC over Fourth of July weekend.

Jonas and Chopra went on a double date with Joe, Turner, and Kevin in London's Mayfair. E! reports that the pair could be moving in together soon. "Priyanka and Nick are still very serious," a source told the outlet. "They have a very healthy relationship and truly are a good pair. Nick has basically been living in Priyanka's New York City apartment with her and they spend a lot of time together. They next step is him permanently moving in, and it has been a discussion."

On July 27, a source close to the couple told People that Jonas and Chopra were engaged in London on her 36th birthday. Jonas later clarified for Vogue that he had shut down a Tiffany & Co. in London to select the ring with his brother a few weeks earlier. He popped the question at midnight after Chopra's birthday while in Crete. "I got down on one knee, again, and I said: Will you make me the happiest man in the world and marry me?" Jonas told the outlet. "No joke—she took about 45 seconds. Forty-five seconds of silence." Finally, the musician said, "I'm going to put this ring on your finger now unless you have any objections."

Around that time, Us Weekly reported that the newly-engaged pair visited newlyweds Prince Harry and Chopra's close friend, Meghan Markle at their country home.

August 2018

A couple of weeks after the engagement, a source told People that Jonas and his family were traveling to India to meet Chopra's family. "Nick has been obsessed with Priyanka since they started dating," the source said. "He obviously thinks she’' beautiful, but he’s also drawn to her intelligence. She has this charisma and energy that draws you to her, and she's fit in so well with his friends and family."

E! ran a report that the Jonas family was traveling to India expressly for an engagement party hosted by Chopra's family. "It's going to be the first time that their families intermingle and get to know each other," a source said. The insider alludes to a short engagement by saying, "Priyanka wants everything to be traditional to respect her family's values, and definitely an Indian wedding. Priyanka and Nick are excited for everyone to meet and to celebrate. Everything is very secretive but guests are expected to head there starting tomorrow. All of the plans are moving quickly and Priyanka and Nick do not want to have a long engagement."

On August 18, Chopra and Jonas finally confirmed their engagement by posting matching photos of them looking into each other's eyes. Chopra's engagement ring was on full display.

Chopra captioned her post, "Taken.. With all my heart and soul.." "Future Mrs. Jonas. My heart. My love." Jonas captions his.

They also posted sets of photos from their familial engagement party. Chopra wrote, "The only way to do this... with Family and God. Thank you all for your wishes and blessings 🙏🏼♥️🎉" Jonas wrote, "Prayer, family and loved ones as the foundation to this new chapter. 🇮🇳" The trip also includes a visit to St. Catherine’s orphanage, which Chopra shares to social media.

Fellow husband-and-wife-to-be Joe and Turner each gave well wishes to the couple. Turner posted, "Wow. First I'm blessed with an incredible future brother-in-law, and now such an beautiful, inside and out, future sister-in-law. I'm so excited to welcome you into the family @priyankachopra. I love you both @nickjonas."

Joe wished his younger brother well by writing, "I couldn't be happier for my brother. Welcome to the family @priyankachopra We love you."

September 2018

The month kicked off with Chopra showcasing her future Instagram Spouse skills with a picture of Jonas posted to Instagram.

The couple each shared a photo of themselves on a double date with Joe and Sophie at the U.S. Open. "It’s a #famjam at #usopen," Chopra captioned the pic.

The couple brought it back to the roots of their relationship by attending Ralph Lauren's 50th anniversary celebration during New York Fashion Week. Some even claimed that Chopra and Jonas recreated Meghan and Harry's engagement photos during a similarly posed shot.

During an appearance on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon, Jonas admitted his fiancée liked "Prick" as their celebrity couple name.

For Jonas's 26th birthday, Chopra posted a sweet selfie of the couple with the caption, "Happy birthday baby. 💋❤️@nickjonas."

Chopra also spent time in September with her future husband's family, sharing several pictures at a ranch from an Oklahoma trip.

October 2018

At the beginning of the month, Chopra posted footage of Jonas playing soccer in Mumbai. "Bae in Bombae!! 😍" she captioned the post.

By mid-October both People and Us Weekly reported that wedding plans are well underway for Jonas and Chopra. "The wedding is coming soon and they really want to blend wedding traditions from both of their cultures that are important to them," said the Us source."Priyanka is having a really good time planning the wedding because it's a mix of Indian and American styles and customs, which she knows so much about."

Both Chopra and Jonas's Instagram posts indicated that they were looking towards the future. Jonas posted a picture of himself and Chopra looking out at a sunset with the caption, "When the future looks oh so bright... 😎 @priyankachopra."

Chopra shared a photo of Jonas with her nephew, writing, "Nephew and boo.. 😍❤️."

The bride-to-be capped off the month with a bachelorette party at Tiffany & Co's Blue Box Cafe in New York City. Guests included Kelly Ripa, Lupita Nyong’o, and Kevin's wife, Danielle.

November 2018

Chopra seemingly headed from one bachelorette celebration to another. The actor posted several shots from the weekend in Amsterdam, which included costume changes and pajama parties. In one post, Chopra declared herself and Turner #TheJSisters.

On one photo from the weekend, Jonas commented, "I am fully insta stalking you….you are so beautiful."

Entertainment Tonight reported that the couple moved up their wedding to the end of 2018. "For Priyanka and Nick, they know that they love one another and are going to be married, so they don't see the appeal in waiting too long," a source said.

The Blast claimed that the couple went to a Beverly Hills courthouse to fill out paperwork for a marriage license.

For Thanksgiving (and some pre-wedding festivities), the couple headed to India. It is a true family affair, as even members of the Jonas clan travel there.

Both Chopra and Jonas shared photos from the visit, which included a puja ceremony, a traditional spiritual event that happens before a major event, such as a wedding.

As people began to suspect that all of the festivities are a pre-wedding agenda, sources explained to Us Weekly why two high-profile friends wouldn't be in attendance. Prince Harry and Meghan Markle were unable to travel due to the Duchess of Sussex's pregnancy.

December 2018

On December 1, the couple tied the knot at the Umaid Bhawan Palace in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. Chopra wore a custom Ralph Lauren gown, with the designer also making a suit for Jonas. Jonas's father officiated the Christian ceremony, per People. The following day, Indian fashion designer Sabyasachi outfitted the bride and groom for the Hindu ceremony.

"One of the most special things that our relationship has given us is a merging of families who love and respect each other's faiths and cultures. And so planning our wedding with an amalgamation of both was so so amazing," both captioned photos of the pre-wedding Mehendi.

The next night, both the bride and groom shared footage from the Sangeet (musical night) of the pre-wedding rituals.

On December 3, the newly married couple shared a sneak peek of their Vogue cover, where they talked in-depth about how they met, the proposal, and what's next.

Soon, the couple shared photos from each of their wedding ceremonies. "And forever starts now... ❤️ @nickjonas," Chopra captions snaps from both the Hindu and Christian ceremonies. "Happiest day of my life. @priyankachopra," Jonas captioned his.

Both Jonas and Chopra also shared family portraits from their nuptials on Instagram.

In the post-wedding afterglow, Mr. and Mrs. Jonas showed off their Chopard wedding rings. Chopra also changed her name to Priyanka Chopra Jonas on Instagram.

About a week after their wedding celebrations, Jonas posted a throwback photo of the couple cutting their cake.

Chopra posted a selfie of herself and her new husband a few days later with the caption, "Marital bliss they say.. 😍❤️💋"

The couple's post-wedding bliss also apparently included Chopra watching the movie Elf for the first time, an occasion Jonas captured for social media.

The end of December brought three different wedding receptions for the couple, each documented on Chopra and Jonas's Instagram pages.

Naturally, the families enjoyed a joint Christmas dinner, documented on Chopra's Instagram.

The newlyweds rounded out 2018 with a ski trip to the Swiss Alps alongside Joe and Sophie.

January 2019

The couple shared moments from their slightly-delayed Caribbean honeymoon on social media. Jonas captioned a photo of the couple by a pool, "Mr. & Mrs. Jonas." An E! source said that Jonas was tasked with planning the honeymoon. The insider said, "(Priyanka) had no idea it was going to be the Caribbean and Nick is planning everything for the trip, it's all a complete surprise to Priyanka. She knew it was a honeymoon trip but didn't find out where they were going until they landed."

At the end of the month, the newlyweds looked in love while attending the Learning Lab Ventures Gala.

February 2019

On February 3, Chopra posted a candid photo of herself and Jonas cuddling on Super Bowl Sunday with the caption, "Home 😍."

The picture later draw mild controversy for its seemingly staged nature. Chopra jokingly defended the post on The Tonight Show Starring Jimmy Fallon. She explained that her cousin Divya was the photographer, asking, "I mean, don't you guys ever go out with friends and you're sitting with a bunch of friends, and you do something cute and another friend takes a picture?"

During the same interview, Chopra discussed why she opted to take Jonas's last name. "I always wanted to add his name to mine because I feel like we're becoming family, and I'm a little traditional and old school like that," Chopra said. "But I don't take away my identity. He gets added to who I am."

Chopra and Jonas also walked the red carpet together for the premiere of her movie Isn't It Romantic.

Valentine's Day brought reliably sweet posts from the newlyweds...

They also walked the red carpet of Vanity Fair's Oscars afterparty.

Finally, Chopra appeared alongside fellow #JSisters Sophie and Danielle for the "Sucker" music video. Jonas shared some behind-the-scenes footage from the shoot, writing, "Thank you to my best friend. Love of my life for being in this video. Starting this new chapter with you by my side means the world. I love you @priyankachopra."

March 2019

In honor of the Jonas Brothers getting a number one hit song with "Sucker," Jonas gifted Chopra with a major car. "When the hubby goes number one.. the wifey gets a @maybach!! Introducing...Extra Chopra Jonas...haha...I love you baby!! Yaaay! Best husband ever...@nickjonas 😍❤️💋," Chopra captioned a pic of the couple in front of the car with champagne.

Chopra appeared on Watch What Happens Live with Andy Cohen where she admitted that the host had "willed" her connection with Jonas the last time she was on the show. "You were the first one that got me really uncomfortable about it," she joked.

The Jonas family headed to Miami for a trip—and watched the band film the music video for their single, “Cool.” Most of the getaway was spent dancing on a yacht, which was promptly shared on Instagram.

Chopra also attended her first ever Jonas Brothers concert while in Atlanta, triggering tears for all who thought they’d be Nick’s wife one day.

April 2019

While speaking at Tina Brown’s 10th Annual Women in the World Summit, Chopra admitted that she initially judged Jonas. “I’ve known him for two years,” she said. “I didn’t think that this is what it [would’ve] turned out to be, and that’s maybe that’s my fault, I judged a book by its cover. When I actually started dating Nick, he surprised me so much." She went on to say, “He’s such an old soul, extremely smart, so good for me because he grounds me so much. I’m a wild child, I do whatever I want whenever I want and he always supports me.”

Chopra supported him right back that same month, attending a Jonas Brothers show in Pennsylvania with Danielle and Sophie.

May 2019

Chopra accompanied Jonas to the Billboard Music Awards, where the brothers reunited to perform new music. That same night, they headed to a Las Vegas wedding chapel for Sophie and Joe’s not-so-secret nuptials. (Thanks, Diplo.)

Next, the newlyweds returned to the start of their love story at the Met Gala. This time, they served as co-chairs for the event and both wear Dior.

“Double trouble! #beetlejuice was amazing! ❤️🙌🏽 to the cast and crew!!,” Chopra captioned a selfie of herself, Nick, Joe, and Sophie at Broadway’s Beetlejuice the Musical

The couple looked dreamy on the Cannes Film Festival red carpet. Jonas captioned a shot from the evening:

"One year ago today I went to go see Beauty and the Beast at the Hollywood bowl with a group of friends. One of those friends was the woman that would become my best friend, my confidant, my muse, my beautiful wife. I am so grateful for our journey together so far. You make me smile every day and you inspire me to be the best version of myself. I am honored to be your husband. I love you. ❤️ @priyankachopra"

June 2019

Chopra went as Jonas’s plus one for the premiere of his Amazon documentary, Happiness Begins.

The same month, the album Happiness Begins dropped, solidifying the return of the Jonas Brothers. "I Believe," a song off the album further solidified the connection between Chopra and Jonas. In the song, Nick sings, “Call me crazy / People saying that we move too fast / But I’ve been waiting, and for a reason / Ain’t no turning back / ‘Cause you show me something I can’t live without / I believe, I believe, I believe.”

During an interview for InStyle, Chopra opened up about hurtful comments over her and Jonas’s ten-year age difference.

“People gave us a lot of shit about that and still do,” she said. “I find it really amazing when you flip it and the guy is older, no one cares and actually people like it.”

On June 18, Chopra captioned a sweet selfie, "That kinda day.. 😍❤️💋😊💏#husbandappreciation."

July 2019

In an interview with ELLE UK, Chopra discussed how things have changed since becoming Mrs. Jonas. “I’d never realised having a husband and a boyfriend are such different things," she said. "When you say your vows, it’s like, this person is my family, and it’s the family I chose. There’s a weird responsibility to them. And a safety that comes from it. We are learning about each other every day.”

The couple headed back to Miami for some boating and PDA-filled posts. "My 💓," Chopra wrote alongside a photo of the couple.

“Date night cooking extravaganza,” Jonas captioned a video of himself and Chopra making pasta in Italy.

For Chopra’s birthday, Jonas shared two photos of his wife smiling for the camera, writing, “Light of my world. My whole heart. I love you baby. Happy birthday.”

August 2019

On August 8, Chopra documented another #JSisters concert appearance in Miami.

TMZ reports that the couple was searching for a new home in Bel Air or Beverly Hills with a price tag at around at $20 million. The outlet also said that Jonas quietly sold his bachelor pad in Beverly Hills for $6.9 million in July.

September 2019

"So proud. When you own your own tequila at 27! @villaone❤," Chopra captioned photos of her husband for his birthday. The only problem? At the time, Jonas was still 26. However, Jonas didn’t seem to notice the age issue, commenting, “My beautiful forever date.”

Babies are seemingly on the brain for Chopra and Jonas. In an interview with Vogue India, Chopra says,“Buying a home and having a baby are on my to-do list.”

On September 16, Chopra shared a proper birthday tribute to Jonas with a montage of their love story. She captioned it, “The light of my life. Everyday with you is better than the last. You deserve all the happiness in the world. Thank you for being the most generous loving man I have ever met. Thank you for being mine. Happy birthday Jaan. I love you @nickjonas.”

November 2019

A few weeks before their wedding anniversary, Chopra surprised Jonas with an early present. She filmed herself giving her husband with a pet puppy, which they named Gino. (Naturally, the dog’s Instagram account soon followed.) "Pri came home with the absolute best surprise this morning," Jonas wrote alongside the video, which he posted on IG. "Please meet our new pup @ginothegerman I haven’t stopped smiling since I woke up this morning and finally realized what was going on. Thank you @priyankachopra ❤️ 🐕" Chopra commented on the photo, "Happy almost anniversary babu 😍 ur face..hilarious 😂"

December 2019

The couple celebrated their one-year wedding anniversary with dual Instagram posts.

“My promise. Then..today.. forever. You bring me joy, grace, balance, excitement, passion.. all in the same moment...thank you for finding me..Happy First wedding anniversary Husband.. @nickjonas ❤️💋And Thank you to everyone for the love and good wishes. We feel blessed,” Chopra captioned a set of photos from their multiple wedding celebrations.

For his part, Jonas posted a single wedding photo to IG and captioned it, "One year ago today we said forever... well forever isn’t nearly long enough. I love you with all of my heart @priyankachopra happy anniversary."

Another way the couple commemorated their first year together? By signing on to produce an Amazon competition series together, news they announced via Instagram.

Later in the month, the husband and wife celebrated Christmas. Chopra posted a pair of holiday-themed photos in front of the Christmas tree. “It’s the happiest Christmas. From ours to yours. Merry Christmas 🎄❄️❤️,” she captioned the post.

January 2020

Jonas and Chopra rang in the new year in Miami. The Jonas Brothers performed at Fontainebleau Miami Beach as part of Dick Clark’s New Year’s Rockin’ Eve telecast. Jonas shared photos from the evening to Instagram with the caption, "2019 was one of the most incredible years of my life. I can’t wait to see all that 2020 has to bring. Happy new year to everyone!"

Chopra and Jonas stole the Golden Globes red carpet at the start of 2020. She wore a pink off-the-shoulder Cristina Ottaviano dress, while Jonas (who presented at the show) wore a dark suit.

The couple’s awards show domination continued at the Grammy Awards. Chopra wore a long-sleeved plunging Ralph and Russo Dress with tassels. While Jonas opted for a guild suit by Ermenegildo Zegna. Chopra was on hand to support Jonas, as he was nominated with the Jonas Brothers for Best Pop Duo/Group Performance for their single "Sucker." He also performed at the awards ceremony.

Chopra made her second appearance in a Jonas Brothers music video when “What a Man Gotta Do” premiered. In the video, the brothers and their wives pay homage to classic ‘70s and ‘80s movies. Jonas and Chopra took on Risky Business, while Sophie and Joe re-enacted Grease and Kevin and Danielle did Say Anything.

February 2020

The couple kept it fairly simple for their Valentine’s Day posts, as Jonas was busy on his Happiness Begins tour with the Jonas Brothers. Chopra shared an onstage photo of her husband with the caption, "My forever valentine. He just happens to look like GI joe in those leather pants!! 😍 #husbandappreciationpost."

Jonas posted three black-and-white photos of the pair backstage. "My Valentine. ♥️," he wrote alongside the pictures.

March 2020

At the start of the month, Chopra and Jonas went horseback riding in Carpinteria, California. They documented the beach outing with an Instagram gallery from the date, complete with matching western wear. "Magic ❤️" Chopra captioned her post.

Next, the couple traveled to India together, where Jonas celebrated his first Holi, an ancient Hindu festival that celebrates the arrival of spring and the victory of good over evil.

"My first Holi! ," Jonas captioned photos from the event. "(Five days early). So much fun celebrating with such incredible people here in my second home in India. #holi"

By March 20, the couple was safely back in the U.S. and sharing a fireside update on their quarantine via Instagram.

The following day, Chopra shared her own homebound Instagram post. In the photo, she and Jonas are curled up with a blanket and their pet dog, Gino.

Chopra also spoke appreciatively about her husband while on Diane Von Furstenberg’s podcast, InCharge. “We wrote like five things that we love about each other," she told DVF of their time in quarantine. “And the first thing he said was ‘your ambition.’ I‘ve never heard a guy say that.”

April 2020

Isolation fever set in for the couple as the coronavirus pandemic really took root in the U.S., and many people quarantined to slow the spread of the virus.

Both have spoken about the different hobbies they're taking up at home. In an article written for Vogue, Chopra said Jonas had begun teaching her how to play piano. "I’ve also started the piano—I make my husband teach me," she wrote. "I’ve never played, but I’ve always wanted to learn an instrument, so I make him give me a half-hour or 45-minute lesson every day." Not only is Jonas her "in-house piano teacher," but an "in-house physical trainer, and in-house writing partner," Chopra noted. On April 25, she posted a photo of herself and her husband, writing, "Felt like wearing a saree. So I did...At home. Miss everyone. ❤️ @nickjonas."

May 2020

However, not all of Jonas’s hobbies have been beneficial to Chopra. She made a cameo in one of his weekly The Voice happy hour videos to express disdain for her husband’s latte art. "Nick is going crazy with these latte designs," she explained. "All he does is drink coffee all day!"

On May 25, the pair celebrated their second anniversary as a couple. Chopra shared the first selfie they ever snapped together. "2 years ago today we took our very first picture together. Every day since then you have brought me endless joy and happiness. I love you @nickjonas Thank you for making our life together so incredible. Here’s to many more date nights... ❤️😍" she wrote.

Jonas shared a photo of the twosome sporting western hats for his anniversary post. He wrote, "This beautiful woman and I went on our first date two years ago today. It has been the best two years of my life, and to think I am lucky enough to get to spend the rest of my life with her is such an incredible blessing. I love you babe. Happy two years ❤️❤️"

July 2020

Chopra offered another update on her quarantine with Jonas to . She spoke about the challenges of being homebound for months on end and what it's like to be away from her family in India. She told the outlet, via Entertainment Tonight, that “although it has been really, really difficult being apart from my mom and brother, who are both in India, I’m so grateful to have spent time with my husband, family and dogs, but mostly with my four year old niece, Krishna. It’s been incredible watching her discover new things." Chopra also said she was "trying to learn the piano" from her husband.

That same month, the couple celebrated a few more events on the ‘gram. Jonas posted a sunlit photo of himself and Chopra for her latest birthday. "I could stare into your eyes forever. I love you baby. You are the most thoughtful, caring and wonderful person I have ever met. I am so grateful we found one another. Happy birthday beautiful. 🎂" he captioned the pic.

The next day, Chopra paid tribute to her husband on the second anniversary of their engagement. She shared a photo of Jonas kissing her on the cheek in front of a mirror, writing, "To the greatest joy of my life. 2 years ago on this day you asked me to marry you! I may have been speechless then but I say yes every moment of everyday since. In the most unprecedented time you made this weekend so incredibly memorable. Thank you for thinking of me all the time. I am the luckiest girl in the world! I love you @nickjonas."

August 2020

And then the Chopra-Jonas clan welcomed a new member to the family. On August 8, the couple shared they had adopted a third dog, Panda. "Welcome to the family Panda! Panda is a Husky Australian Shepard mix rescue and we’re already in love ❤️," Jonas wrote on his Instagram.

Chopra shared the same photo, writing, "Our new family portrait! Welcome to the family, Panda! We adopted this little rescue (soon he won’t be so little) just a few weeks ago. We can’t be sure but he seems to be a Husky Australian Shepard mix.... and those eyes... and the ears!!! ❤️😍❤️🐼❤️🐶 " She even admitted that their dog Diana wasn’t down for the photo-op, so she was photoshopped into the portrait. "BTW @diariesofdiana wasn’t around for our little photoshoot, but we couldn’t leave our #1 girl out...so...we made it work! 😂 😉"

September 2020

On September 12, Chopra posted a sweet car selfie with Jonas, writing, "My forever guy...so grateful for you @nickjonas."

A few days later, she posted a tribute video for Jonas’s 28th birthday. "So grateful you were born. Happy birthday my love. 😍❤️🎉 @nickjonas" Chopra captioned the post.

October 2020

The following month, Chopra announced that her memoir, Unfinished, would be hitting the shelves. Ever the supportive spouse, Jonas shared a photo of the cover to his Instagram. "So incredibly proud of you @priyankachopra quick question... can I please get a signed copy 😏 everyone go pre order my wife’s beautiful memoir now!" he wrote alongside the pic.

Chopra replied, "Only if I get an autographed copy of BLOOD! Let’s get it!! I love u babu! 😍"

May 2022

The couple welcomed their daughter Malti Marie Chopra Jonas, after she was delivered via surrogate in early 2022. Four months later on May 8, they shared their first photo of the newborn on their Instagram pages. In the picture, Chopra is holding the baby for skin-to-skin contact with Jonas at her side. The baby is in pink with a white headband featuring a bow, and her face is discreetly covered.

In the caption, they shared how Malti needed to remain in the NICU for more than 100 days, causing them a great deal of stress and worry.

“On this Mother’s Day we can’t help but reflect on these last few months and the rollercoaster we’ve been on, which we now know, so many people have also experienced,” the actress wrote. “After 100 plus days in the NICU, our little girl is finally home.”

She continued, “Every family’s journey is unique and requires a certain level of faith, and while ours was a challenging few months, what becomes abundantly clear, in retrospect, is how precious and perfect every moment is. We are overjoyed that our little girl is finally home, and just want to thank every Doctor, nurse and specialist at Rady Children’s La Jolla and Cedar Sinai, Los Angeles, who were there selflessly every step of the way. Our next chapter begins now, and our baby is truly a badass. Let’s get it MM! Mommy and Daddy love you.”

November 2022

The couple has kept Malti’s face mostly private, but will occasionally share a little glimpse of her cuteness. In November, Chopra shared a shot of the 10-month-old bundled up in her car seat, with a little pink beanie partially covering her face.

Chopra captioned the image, “I mean…” along with two heart-eyed emojis.

An insider told E! News this summer that the couple are "very in love."

The insider added, “It’s like Malti has brought them good luck with how amazing things seem for them all around right now.”

August 2023

In an interview with People, Jonas reflected on the “surprisingly difficult” part of his 2018 wedding to Chopra.

“There’s this one moment in Indian weddings where the bride and groom are lifted on the shoulders of their family members and there’s sort of a game that’s played where this garland is put on each other,” he said. “They try to be the first to put the garland on the other. And it’s surprisingly difficult, especially when you have someone as competitive as me and Pri. But whoever is the one to put it on first, that side of the family is the more dominant.”

He added, “So it’s really for the family members to feel pride and that’s just a funny game. But it’s really heartwarming and a great way for the families to all connect.”

The couple had a second wedding officiated by Jonas’ dad, Kevin Jonas Sr. and Jonas said the contrasting ceremonies showed “how similar the different religions actually are and the ceremonies themselves have a lot of heart.”

“That allowed us to really connect with our families and with each other,” Jonas explained. “Which is the most important thing.”

September 2023

On Sunday, September 3, Chopra shared some shots of herself with Jonas as they traveled to Austin, Texas. First, she shared a picture of herself sitting next to her husband in the car with the words, “See you soon.”

She was wearing a white top and silver necklace and earrings. Her hair was back in a smooth bun and Jonas looked towards her and into the camera.

In the next pic, she had a close up of her husband looking out an airplane window, writing “dreamy.”

She added a heart-eye emoji over it.

November 2023

On Thursday, November 30, Chopra and Jonas headed to Casa Cipriani for a date night wearing stylish fall ensembles in the chilly weather. Chopra was wearing a bright red midi dress with a square neckline under a black trench coat. She paired it with black heels, and carried a red purse. Her hair was down and flowing, and she wore bright red lipstick.

Jonas wore a navy blue coat over a beige Gucci cardigan and white shirt. He had on denim and black boots. The couple held hands as they walked.

December 2023

On Friday, December 22, Chopra shared new pictures with Jonas and Malti in a carousel of photos that she captioned, “Lately,” along with the prayer hands emoji. It seems like lately Chopra has been spending time with friends during the holidays, sitting in her husband’s lap, and playing with Malti in the yard.

In one photo, the proud mom hugs 23-month-old Malti from behind as she makes her way across the grass. The toddler is wearing a red trucker hat with drawings of pizza and noodles on it and a yellow sweatsuit and sneakers. In another picture, she’s peeking over the top of her swing bucket at the camera, and in a third photo Malti is leaning over a toy car.

January 2024

On Saturday, January 6, Chopra shared a carousel of pictures from a restful time at the beach in Cabo San Lucas with Jonas and Malti. There are several family photos with the baby, as well as a video clip of the toddler playfully sitting at the helm of a boat with her parents.

“Took some time to feed my soul,” she wrote in the caption. “2023 had me spent.. maybe I still am. Here’s to a 2024 highlighted by peace, respite, family, love, joy and community. Hold your loved ones close. We are very lucky if we can. Happy new year.”

On January 16 and 17, both Chopra and Jonas shared posts to celebrate their daughter’s second birthday. “She is our miracle. And she is 2. ❤️🙏🏽,” Chopra wrote on the 17th.

Jonas shared in a gallery of photos from Malti’s birthday party on the 16th, writing, “Our little angel is 2 years old ❤️”

May 2024

Preceding the beginning of his new musical comedy project titled Power Ballad, Chopra wrote a loving tribute to Jonas. He’ll be starring across from comedian Paul Rudd, and Chopra seemed to be excited about the timing of their work—she just finished filming Prime Video film, Heads of State with Idris Elba and John Cena.

“Husband appreciation post: As I finish one he starts one,” Priyanka wrote on May 9 in the caption of a picture of Jonas. “The universe keeps us in sync. So happy to be reunited as he starts filming Power Ballad. Congratulations on your first day, baby. There is no one who works harder than you. This is going to be amazing.”

On May 10, she shared a family picture with Jonas and baby Malti, captioning the picture, “My angels.”

June 2024

On Saturday, June 29, the couple were photographed on the Gold Coast, enjoying a mini vacation in Australia where Chopra is working on her new film The Bluff. They visited a friend’s home for an evening around the campfire in a set of Adirondack chairs. they brought their daughter, Malti Marie, and were joined by the actress’s mother, Dr. Madhu Akhouri Chopra and family friends Sudeep and Tamanna Dutt.

Chopra also shared some pictures from her time in the country and what are hopefully shots of makeup on her legs. Otherwise, she has some pretty serious bug bites.

July 2024

On July 18, Jonas posted an Instagram tribute to mark Chopra’s 42nd birthday. He shared a carousel of photos featuring them together and wrote, “The woman that you are. How lucky am I. Happy birthday my love.”

On the 19, he celebrated her again, but more specifically the anniversary of their engagement. Jonas shared a never-before-seen picture from the night he proposed on Instagram. In the photo, he is smiling at the camera and holding up his blushing bride’s hand to show the ring as she hides her face. The room is dark, but he is in black and she’s wearing a white ensemble. In the caption, Jonas wrote, “I asked the most amazing woman in the world to marry me 6 years ago today. Thank you for saying yes @priyankachopra.”

She shared the photo in her Instagram Stories and wrote over it, “Cannot believe it’s been 6 years since this day.”
